documentation.content: Alerts when usage reaches 80% for 1 minute. [View quotas](https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/quotas

conditions.displayName: Usage nearing per-minute rate quota limit

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query: fetch ${MONITORED_RESOURCE}| filter ${OUTER_FILTER}| {metric ${METRIC_USAGE_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_USAGE_FILTER}| align delta_gauge(1m)| group_by [], sum(value.net_usage); metric ${METRIC_LIMIT_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_LIMIT_FILTER} | group_by [],sliding(1m), .min}| ratio| every 1m| condition gt(val(), 0.8 '1')
